unicef-a17.def: Percentage of adolescents aged 10-14 years who, during the reference week, spent at least 21 hours on unpaid household services.
unicef-a17.name: Transition to work, Engagement in household chores
unicef-a17.source: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: July 2021.
